citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on 08-
APR-21. Called facility and the representative stated no adult was available at that time.
End Section
